GoogleMeuNegocio.title: Google Business
GoogleMeuNegocio.description: Manage your locations, reviews, posts and metrics from Google Business Profile
GoogleMeuNegocio.connect_description: Connect your Google Business Profile account to manage locations, reviews and posts directly from the dashboard
GoogleMeuNegocio.manage_locations: Manage all your Google Business Profile locations
GoogleMeuNegocio.view_reviews: View and respond to customer reviews
GoogleMeuNegocio.manage_posts: Create and manage posts for your locations
GoogleMeuNegocio.searching_reviews: Searching for reviews from your locations
GoogleMeuNegocio.automation_description: Configure automations for posts, alerts and synchronization using n8n
GoogleMeuNegocio.review_alerts_description: Receive automatic notifications when new reviews are published
GoogleMeuNegocio.auto_posts_description: Schedule automatic posts based on events or specific dates
GoogleMeuNegocio.periodic_reports_description: Generate and send automatic reports of metrics and insights
GoogleMeuNegocio.n8n_settings_description: Configure your n8n instance for advanced automation
GoogleMeuNegocio.n8n_info: Configure your n8n instance to access automations. Learn more about n8n
GoogleMeuNegocio.new_review_alert_description: Email notification when receiving 1-3 star reviews
GoogleMeuNegocio.monthly_report_description: Sends complete report of monthly metrics
GoogleMeuNegocio.security_note: Tokens are stored securely. You can revoke access at any time.
